…people I know, and I rise this evening to recognize and honor the  67 lives we lost, 1 year ago tomorrow, on January 29, 2025.

On that night, Flight 5342 took off from Wichita, KS, and flew toward  our Nation's Capital with 64 passengers on board. In Washington, DC, a  Black Hawk helicopter with three Army soldiers would soon be in the air  as well. Flight…

…you very  much for the opportunity to join with you today and throughout a long  process since January 29, earlier this year.

That flight--Flight 5342--originated in Wichita, KS, and, as we know,  on January 29, it collided with an Army Black Hawk helicopter, and it  changed the way we look at air safety every moment since then.

…President, today, I rise to honor the passing of a  101-year-old Kansan, World War II veteran, and American hero, Horace  ``Jim'' Sharp.

Mr. Sharp was born in Morris County, KS, and he spent his early years  tending to the family farm--not an unusual thing in Kansas, certainly  not in his generation.

At age 19, Jim surrendered his farm deferment, courageously…
